query.statement:
SELECT CASE WHEN DPT1 = 'A1' THEN SUBSTR(DEPT,5,2) ELSE RTRIM(DPT1) END AS DPT1 , DPT1_N , DUTY_N , RANK , RANK_N , SUBSTR(DEPT,1,4) AS DEPT , DEPT_N , PSNO , IRUM , SUBSTR(DPT1,1,1) AS ORD2 , CASE WHEN DPT1 = 'A1' THEN SUBSTR(DEPT,5,1) ELSE SUBSTR(DPT1,1,1) END AS ORD3 , VALUE(TELH,'') AS TELH FROM SAPHEE.ZHRT001 H1 WHERE H1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND H1.LEAV = '00000000' AND H1.DEPT > '' AND DPT1 <> 'A1' AND (JIKJ IN ('2', '3','5') OR (JIKJ = '1' AND SUBSTR(DEPT,5,2) >'10' ) )
UNION
SELECT '00' AS DPT1 , DPT1_N , '' AS DUTY_N , RANK , RANK_N , SUBSTR(DEPT,1,4) AS DEPT , DUTY_N AS DEPT_N , PSNO , IRUM , SUBSTR(DPT1,1,1) AS ORD2 , CASE WHEN DPT1 = 'A1' THEN SUBSTR(DEPT,5,1) ELSE SUBSTR(DPT1,1,1) END AS ORD3 , VALUE(TELH,'') AS TELH FROM SAPHEE.ZHRT001 H1 WHERE H1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND H1.LEAV = '00000000' AND H1.DEPT > '' AND DPT1 = 'A1' AND (SUBSTR(DEPT,5,1) > '0' OR DEPT = 'A1010100')
ORDER BY DPT1, DEPT, DUTY_N DESC, RANK, PSNO FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
